articles.title: EU To Present Law That Forces iPhones To Use USB-C Next Month - Lowyat.NET
articles.description: The Lightning connector is ubiquitous to Apple products. And particularly the iPhone, since the iPad Pros already use USB-C. But the European Commission is expected to present new legislation to force the brand to adopt the universal standard. The legislation…

articles.author: AGENCY
articles.title: After 60 years of Indian rule, Goa's disappearing Portuguese legacy - The Star Online
articles.description: In Goa, an Indian coastal state once administered by Portugal, there is little appetite for the territory’s 450 years of European heritage
articles.content:
As Lorraine Alberto begins her Portuguese class at Goa University, students from the former colony are in short supply.
